text: is a train station on the Osaka Metro Chūō Line in Minato-ku, Osaka, Japan. It is the stop that serves the Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan aquarium. ==Station layout== There is an elevated island platform with two tracks on the third floor. ==Adjacent stations== Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1961 Category:Osaka Metro stations
title: Ōsakakō Station
